author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* DDEcalEndcapAlgo port to DD4hep. Note, most of it ported **ASIS**

The Ecal Endcaps look exactly as they are if using DD, including the inverted shapes in the reflected dees:

![Screen Shot 2019-07-12 at 16 30 31](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1390682/61136202-7204b580-a4c3-11e9-9634-a979cebc1d7f.png)

Note: there is an outstanding issue with ReflectionRotation. It's being discussed. In the meantime a workaround has been implemented here.

#### PR validation:

```cmsRun Geometry/EcalAlgo/test/python/testEcalGeometry.py```
